name: The Unbeliever
description:
I developed this demo simply because I'm a huge Donaldson fan, especially the Chronicles of Thomas Covenant. Read and reread many times! I'm not sure what to do with this since I haven't heard back from the publishers. Any advice/thoughts?

An RPG with a twist: Covenant abhors killing so he doesn't gain experience that way, he gains it by casting magic and through tasks.
